name: A Fat Cat Sat on a Rat Quiz | Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
flat.

	A fat cat sat on a rat...and squashed him flat.

rode.

	Did the toad fly? No, the toad rode.

sigh.

	Please don't weep or sigh or cry. Eat a piece of pumpkin pie!

much.

	Please, oh please, oh please don't touch--even if you want to very much.

late.

	Come on, come on, let's not be late. Let's not make your teacher wait.

fur.

	A skunk? Oh, really, are you sure? Yes, look and see her pretty fur.

banana.

	Is Anna eating an apple? No, that's a banana in Anna's hand. American pronounciation.

fellow.

	See that boy whose shirt is yellow? Do you know that little fellow?

worm.

	I was digging in the dirt. I was looking for a worm. My mom said, 'Stop, you might catch a germ.'

sailor.

	That's my niece, Ms. Taylor. When she grows up she wants to be a sailor.
